div.p: Box 243/4, Shillinglaw papers, La Trobe Australian manuscripts collection, State Library of Victoria, Melbourne.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;

div.p:
MS annotation by Shillinglaw: 'ansd 10.V.80'. Letter not found.
7/4/80.

Allow me to ask you, dear Mr Shillinglaw, whether perhaps you have on loan my copy of the English Edition of Labillardière (voyage in search of Lapérouse).
MS annotation by Shillinglaw: 'No'. A copy of this work (Labillardière (1800a)) is in the library at the Royal Botanic Gardens Melbourne, presumably the copy listed in the catalogue in M to J. McCulloch, 30 September 1865.
I want the work for a note on Eucalypts (for my Euc. Atlas),
B80.13.14; the first Decade of Eucalyptographia referring to Labillardière is Decade 5.
and am missing it in my library. So in all probability one of my friends had it, but I cannot remember, with whom it may be. Excuse kindly my enquiry.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
